name: Ceremonial lamellar robes
data: It increases the users strength impressively.
It decreases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has awesome armour class for its type (excellent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users electric resistance a bit.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It increases the users cold resistance a bit.
